synopsis:
Ikeike! Momon-chan is a series of shorts created to promote the Omote Sando upscale shopping center in Tokyo.
Each episode typically focuses on the comedic interactions between Momon-chan, the peach girl and Tanu, the tanuki, as they discuss everything from horoscopes, to Christmas, to tools that reference Doraemon, to traditional Japanese New Yearâ€™s games, and much much more.
